description:
***1000+ Students from over 95 countries!***

***Added English Captions***

Learn the fundamentals of marketing! Covering from business problems to start planning your offering. Learn the marketing concepts to get you started.

The choice for absolute beginners to grasp the basic concepts and move on to the parts that are more interested later. You can have your product ready or you may be planning it.

Ideal for those who prefer simpler talk with academic validity. In this course, technical terms are used to minimum. The important technical terms are included in the resources section for easier reading and future reference.

Don't miss the free preview!

Marketing basics include concepts like the market, segmentation, targeting, positioning and the marketing mix

Watch 18 video lectures and get your marketing education!

Enough Examples and Exercises to get you thinking about market segments, products and services
title: Marketing Fundamentals for Absolute Beginners
